scripts.watch: microbundle -o dist/bhwf.min.js watch & npm run watch-css
scripts.build: microbundle -o dist/bhwf.min.js && cp src/*.css dist/ && npm run minify-css
scripts.watch-css: nodemon -w src -e css --exec 'cp src/*.css dist/ && npm run minify-css'
scripts.minify-css: for file in dist/*.css; do cleancss -o ${file%.css}.min.css $file; done
